home.description: DevRelCon is the premiere global conference for Developer Relations, Developer Experience, Developer Marketing, and Technical Community Management. This is a unique opportunity to hear talks from industry leaders, connect with your peers on best practices and challenges, and participate in hands-on workshops and discussions.

speakers.title: Speakers
speakers.metaDescription: Learn how to evolve your team's DevRel strategy and tactics from our exciting lineup of Developer Relations leaders, practitioners, and community members.
speakers.description: Learn how to evolve your team's DevRel strategy and tactics from our exciting lineup of Developer Relations leaders, practitioners, and community members.

previousSpeakers.title: Previous Speakers
previousSpeakers.metaDescription: Check out some of our previous speakers

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.description: We have a variety of keynotes, lightning talks, workshops, and sessions for you to check out. We also encourage all attendees to network and meet one another in our Unconference and hallway track. If any scheduled times change, we will update attendees via announcements digitally and in-person.

coc.title: Code of Conduct
coc.metaDescription: Learn more about our expectations for all those who participate in our community

neighborhood.title: Neighborhood Guide
neighborhood.metaDescription: Learn more about the neighborhood DevRelCon is happening in

location.label: Location
location.name: Industry City
location.description: Located just 20 minutes from Manhattan, Industry City is a historic shipping, warehousing, and manufacturing complex nestled on the New York waterfront. The space was reimagined in the 2010s and transformed into a space for designers, artists, and creators with studios, co-working spaces, restaurants, workshops, distilleries and breweries, and more.
